body: One of the WORST foods you can give your dog! Folks, folks, folks .... what are you thinking?  This legacy dog brand has some of the worst ingredients you can give your dog!  I thought by 2021 people were more enlightened and especially with so many more healthy options out there — but, apologies to you all, you may not have had the opportunity to have been exposed to the possibilities, let me enlighten.  Let's look at some of the ingredients:GROUND WHOLE GRAIN CORN: I mean really, corn as the first ingredient?  That's what a dog wants?  No.  No.  They want animal protein!MEAT AND BONE MEAL: The problem with meat meal is that the manufacturer doesn't have to disclose exactly what's in it.  Meal can include many parts of the animal that you would find absolutely disgusting and are not healthy for your dog.  (Conversely, if a "meal" ingredient is listed as the actual animal, such as chicken meal, lamb meal, turkey meal, you are usually getting the muscle meat and not all the extraneous parts of the animal.)CORN GLUTEN MEAL:  Again ... why?SOYBEAN MEAL:  Why would you think soybean meal would be good for a dog?  It is actually responsible for causing a lot of gastric problems in dogs.  Look it up!NATURAL FLAVOR:  Also, a questionable ingredient — you really don't know what this is composed of.CHICKEN BY-PRODUCT MEAL:  And here you go with "by-product meal."  You should NEVER give your dog a by-product meal.  I mean now we're talking — and apologies for the grotesqueness — claws, beaks, feathers, and worse.DRIED PLAIN BEET PULP: although not as bad as the above, this is a filler which really ain't all that great for your dog.  Manufacturers usually say, "it's a great fiber for your dog!" but there are way better ingredients to give your dog if they need more fiber, such as pumpkin.BREWERS RICE:  same as above, not as harmful as many of the other ingredients, but a filler and something your dog doesn't need.Folks, I want your dogs to live long and healthy lives and using this food — and especially doing so, day in and day out, for their lives — simply ain't healthy.  There are SO many other more healthy options for kibble on Amazon, they have everything.  If you love your dog like they are family, don't put price as the sole overriding factor.  No, look, price should definitely be factored in, some foods are ridiculously expensive — all I'm saying it to combine price AND quality of ingredients.  There are healthy dog foods out there (or, at the very least, healthier than Pedigree!) that can be purchased at decent prices, especially on Amazon.  Come on, folks, this is for the health of your dog — you want your dog to live a long, illness-free life.Just take out a half-hour and do some research and try and find a number of articles about healthy dog food and you will be amazed at what you find.  (One caveat, however:  a lot of newer dog foods are using peas as a main ingredient — that is one that is a huge no-no as new studies have shown they can cause unwanted problems.)  Good luck!

body: SHARP DANGEROUS STRANDS LODGED INSIDE ALL OF THEKIBBLE I bought this dog food on Amazon and got it delivered on the 3rd of February.  This would be the second bag since late December that i bought. I finally opened it today and after i already fed some kibbles to my puppies, i inspected the dog food and realized there are literal sharp black and silver fiberglass looking strands lodged INSIDE the kibbles. WTF?!?! My 9 month old puppy has been vomiting yellow fluid on random occasions and coughing after eating it and drinking an excessive amount of water and still coughing crazy.  Like if something were bothering his throat. Sometimes he starts whining and whimpering when hes about to poop as if something were bothering him inside.  Im now wondering if its due to those sharp same strands lodged inside his throat and digestive system from the previous bag i purchased on amazon (which i did not inspect for strands unfortunately,  only for mold or bugs like some reviews saw) i attached the pictures i took today of the bag and the kibbles. These strands are so sharp they scratch against the skin. And if you touch the ends with your fingers, you will feel the tip of the strands trying to poke through the skin. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE,  AND DANGEROUS
